nodes.title: Add missing letter to description in AboutActivity
Fix wrong error crouton on friendlist
Fix picasso offline crash & Traditional list stretch issue.
API rewrite to use retrofit + some changes to all related code
Fix database upgrade crash (Fiends & profile) Fixes #82.
Fix search results was not using the right url.
Bugfix: fullsync shows success notification even if the sync failed
FriendList update & bugs fixes & New api (supported).
NavDrawer + Most Popular and Top Rated Anime lists
Fixed Bug causing 2 searchActivities to launch
Fixed typos in the About screen.
Completed fix issue #44; repair tests for JDK==1.6
Implemented a feature search and adding anime or manga. Refactored code. Writed tests.
Clean up project and ignore binaries
Fix crash on pressing back after DV is done with loading (DetailView)
Show loading indicator while downloading additional data (DetailView)
Fix landscape crash caused by swipe to refresh (DetailView)
Add language changer in the settings
Fix isAdded() method on refresh by requesting more details (DetailView)
Add passing between friendlist and profile
Merge Friend table into Profile table
Fix aspect ratio problem of the cover (Detailview)
Pass IGF records to the DetailView
Fix anime & manga overwriting in database
Add roboto fonts to fix the actionbar item bug
Change HEW maven URL to the new maven URL
Fix typos on the spanish localization
Database fixes and a little cleanup
Fix Grid Too Short on specific devices
Fix Unknown Item Totals shows 0 on Detailview (fixes #207)
Add new cards for UI improvement & #26
Fix some missing translations in DetailView
Don't return null for list tasks with empty results in NetworkTask

Fix the List type when returning from the profile or friendlist.

Gradle update and optimisation (also fixes Android Studio building)

Remove unused imports and fix online indicator (friends).

Fix friendlist bug (showing twice an user & hiding an user).
Change API URL to use https
Don't sort database query results case sensitive
Replace friendlist developer color with a darker one.
Fix profile image in portrait mode
Show loading indicator while downloading lists
Fix crouton spam if an anime/manga does not exist.
Generate status RadioButtons in status selection dialog from string-array

Use card background in details cover image

Fix share(profile) using int(id) instead string.
Database version downgrade from 7 to Version 6.
Add lombok project to reduce the amount of codes

Fix bugs that were present in the RC

Cleanup Save anime to anime relation method

Fix bugs in the beta app

Fix messed up episode/volume counter when preceding text is wrapped

Don't capitalize the user status string

Force one instance just like in the past to fix the DB locked issue
